metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Developer Week April 7-11, our week-long series of new product announcements and events dedicated to enhancing the developer experience to fuel productivity!

relatedBlades.title: Welcome to Developer Week
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare Developer Week April 7-11, our week-long series of new product announcements and events dedicated to enhancing the developer experience to fuel productivity!

imageAssetFile.altText: Developer Week 2025

contentfulAsset.description: Developer Week 2025 logo

features.title: Welcome to Developer Week 2025
features.description: We're kicking off Cloudflare's 2025 Developer Week â€” our innovation week dedicated to announcements for developers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Welcome to Developer Week 2025

contentfulAsset.description: Developer Week 2025 logo

features.title: Piecing together the Agent puzzle: MCP, authentication & authorization, and Durable Objects free tier
features.description: Cloudflare delivers the toolkit for AI agents with new Agents SDK support for MCP (Model Context Protocol) clients, authentication/authorization/hibernation for MCP servers, and Durable Objects free tier.

imageAssetFile.altText: Piecing together the Agent puzzle: MCP, Authentication & Authorization & Durable Objects Free tier

contentfulAsset.description: Piecing together the Agent puzzle: MCP, Authentication & Authorization & Durable Objects Free tier

features.title: Introducing AutoRAG: fully managed Retrieval-Augmented Generation on Cloudflare
features.description: AutoRAG is here: fully managed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines powered by Cloudflare's global network and powerful developer ecosystem. Simplify how you build and scale RAG pipelines to power your context-aware AI chatbots and search applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Introducing AutoRAG: fully managed Retrieval-Augmented Generation on Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Introducing AutoRAG: fully managed Retrieval-Augmented Generation on Cloudflare

features.title: Cloudflare Workflows is now GA: production-ready durable execution
features.description: Workflows â€” a durable execution engine built directly on top of Workers â€” is now Generally Available. We've landed new human-in-the-loop capabilities, more scale, and more metrics: just what you need for a production-ready service.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Workflows is now GA: production-ready durable execution

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare Workflows is now GA: production-ready durable execution

features.title: Cloudflare acquires Outerbase to expand database and agent developer experience capabilities
features.description: Cloudflare has acquired Outerbase, expanding our database and agent developer experience capabilities.

features.title: Build global MySQL apps using Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive
features.description: MySQL comes to Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive: your favorite MySQL drivers and ORMs are now compatible with the Workers runtime, and Hyperdrive allows you to connect to your regional database from Workers with optimal performance.

imageAssetFile.altText: Build global MySQL apps using Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive

contentfulAsset.description: Build global MySQL apps using Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive

features.title: Pools across the sea: how Hyperdrive speeds up access to databases and why we're making it free
features.description: Hyperdrive, Cloudflare's global connection pooler, relies on some key innovations to make your database connections work. We go deep into the details of what that looks like, in celebration of announcing its availability for Free Plan customers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Pools across the sea: how Hyperdrive speeds up access to databases and why we're making it free

contentfulAsset.description: Pools across the sea: how Hyperdrive speeds up access to databases and why we're making it free

features.title: "Just use Vite"â€¦ with the Workers runtime
features.description: The Cloudflare Vite plugin integrates Vite, one of the most popular build tools for web development, with the Workers runtime. Today, we are announcing the 1.0 release and official support for React Router v7.

imageAssetFile.altText: "Just use Vite"â€¦ with the Workers runtime

contentfulAsset.description: "Just use Vite"â€¦ with the Workers runtime

features.title: Deploy your Next.js app to Cloudflare Workers with the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext
features.description: With the 1.0-beta release of the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext, you can host your Next.js 14 and 15 applications on Cloudflare Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Deploy your Next.js app to Cloudflare Workers with the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext

contentfulAsset.description: Deploy your Next.js app to Cloudflare Workers with the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext

features.title: Your frontend, backend, and database â€” now in one Cloudflare Worker
features.description: You can now deploy static sites and full-stack applications on Cloudflare Workers â€“ the primitives are all here. Framework support for React Router v7, Astro, Vue, and more are generally available today, as is the Cloudflare Vite plugin. Connect to Postgres and MySQL databases with Hyperdrive.

imageAssetFile.altText: Everything in One Place: Full-Stack Development on Cloudflare Workers

contentfulAsset.description: Everything in One Place: Full-Stack Development on Cloudflare Workers

features.title: Skip the setup: deploy a Workers application in seconds
features.description: You can now add a Deploy to Cloudflare button to your repository's README when building a Workers application, making it simple for other developers to set up and deploy your project!

imageAssetFile.altText: Skip the setup: deploy a Workers application in seconds

contentfulAsset.description: Skip the setup: deploy a Workers application in seconds

features.title: Make your apps truly interactive with Cloudflare Realtime and RealtimeKit
features.description: Announcing Cloudflare Realtime and RealtimeKit, a complete toolkit for shipping real-time audio and video apps in days with SDKs for Kotlin, React Native, Swift, JavaScript, and Flutter.

imageAssetFile.altText: Make your apps truly interactive with Cloudflare Realtime and RealtimeKit

contentfulAsset.description: Make your apps truly interactive with Cloudflare Realtime and RealtimeKit

features.title: Introducing Cloudflare Secrets Store (Beta): secure your secrets, simplify your workflow
features.description: Securely store, manage, and deploy account level secrets to Cloudflare Workers through Cloudflare Secrets Store, now available in beta â€“ with role-based access control, audit logging, and Wrangler support.

imageAssetFile.altText: Introducing Cloudflare Secrets Store (Beta): Secure your secrets, simplify your workflow

contentfulAsset.description: Introducing Cloudflare Secrets Store (Beta): Secure your secrets, simplify your workflow

features.title: Cloudflare Snippets are now Generally Available
features.description: Cloudflare Snippets are now GA, enabling fast, cost-free JavaScript-based HTTP traffic modifications across all paid plans. With Terraform support and upcoming integration with Secrets Store, Snippets provide a powerful, production-ready solution for managing HTTP traffic via code rules.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Snippets are now Generally Available

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare Snippets are now Generally Available

features.title: Introducing Workers Observability: logs, metrics, and queries â€“ all in one place
features.description: We've improved Observability for Workers by announcing the General Availability of Workers Logs and the introduction of the Query Builder to help you investigate log events across all of your Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Introducing Workers Observability: logs, metrics, and queries â€“ all in one place

contentfulAsset.description: Introducing Workers Observability: logs, metrics, and queries â€“ all in one place

features.title: Network performance update: Developer Week 2025
features.description: Cloudflare has been tracking and comparing our speed with other top networks since 2021. Let's take a look at how things have changed since our last update.

imageAssetFile.altText: Network performance update: Developer Week 2025

contentfulAsset.description: Network performance update: Developer Week 2025

features.title: Making Super Slurper 5x faster with Workers, Durable Objects, and Queues
features.description: We re-architected Super Slurper from the ground up using our Developer Platform â€” leveraging Cloudflare Workers, Durable Objects, and Queues â€” and improved transfer speeds by up to 5x.

imageAssetFile.altText: Making Super Slurper 5x faster with Workers, Durable Objects, and Queues

contentfulAsset.description: Making Super Slurper 5x faster with Workers, Durable Objects, and Queues

features.title: R2 Data Catalog: Managed Apache Iceberg tables with zero egress fees
features.description: R2 Data Catalog is now in public beta: a managed Apache Iceberg data catalog built directly into your R2 bucket

imageAssetFile.altText: R2 Data Catalog: Managed Apache Iceberg tables with zero egress fees

contentfulAsset.description: R2 Data Catalog: Managed Apache Iceberg tables with zero egress fees

features.title: Sequential consistency without borders: how D1 implements global read replication
features.description: D1, Cloudflare's managed SQL database, announces read replication beta. In this post, we do a technical deep dive of the read replication implementation and how your queries can remain consistent across all regions.

imageAssetFile.altText: Sequential consistency without borders: How D1 implements global read replication

contentfulAsset.description: Sequential consistency without borders: How D1 implements global read replication

features.title: Just landed: streaming ingestion on Cloudflare with Arroyo and Pipelines
features.description: We've just shipped our new streaming ingestion service, Pipelines â€” and we've acquired Arroyo, enabling us to bring new SQL-based, stateful transformations to Pipelines and R2.

imageAssetFile.altText: Just landed: streaming ingestion on Cloudflare with Arroyo and Pipelines

contentfulAsset.description: Just landed: streaming ingestion on Cloudflare with Arroyo and Pipelines

features.title: A global virtual private cloud for building secure cross-cloud apps on Cloudflare Workers
features.description: We're announcing Workers VPC: a global private network that allows applications deployed on Cloudflare Workers to connect to your legacy cloud infrastructure. Now, you can unlock access to your existing APIs and data in external clouds and build global, modern, cross-cloud apps on Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: A global virtual private cloud for building secure cross-cloud apps on Cloudflare Workers

contentfulAsset.description: A global virtual private cloud for building secure cross-cloud apps on Cloudflare Workers

features.title: Simple, scalable, and global: Containers are coming to Cloudflare Workers in June 2025
features.description: Cloudflare Containers are coming this June. Run new types of workloads on our network with an experience that is simple, scalable, global and deeply integrated with Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Simple, scalable, and global: Containers are coming to Cloudflare Workers in June 2025

contentfulAsset.description: Simple, scalable, and global: Containers are coming to Cloudflare Workers in June 2025

features.title: Startup spotlight: building AI agents and accelerating innovation with Cohort #5
features.description: Explore how developers are using Cloudflare to scale AI workloads and streamline automation. Learn more about what our participants in Workers Launchpad Cohort #4 have built, and check out the latest startups participating in Cohort #5.

imageAssetFile.altText: Startup spotlight: building AI agents and accelerating innovation with Cohort #5

contentfulAsset.description: Startup spotlight: building AI agents and accelerating innovation with Cohort #5

features.title: Startup Program update: empowering every stage of the startup journey
features.description: Cloudflare's Startup Program offers up to $250,000 in credits for companies building on our Developer Platform across 4 tiers: $5,000, $25,000, $100,000, and $250,000.

imageAssetFile.altText: Startup Program update: empowering every stage of the startup journey

contentfulAsset.description: Startup Program update: empowering every stage of the startup journey

features.title: How we simplified NCMEC reporting with Cloudflare Workflows
features.description: We transitioned to Cloudflare Workflows to manage complex, multi-step processes more efficiently. This shift replaced our queues-based architecture in our National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC) reporting system with a structured, retryable workflow that's easier to debug and maintain.

imageAssetFile.altText: How we simplified NCMEC reporting with Cloudflare Workflows

contentfulAsset.description: How we simplified NCMEC reporting with Cloudflare Workflows

features.title: A next-generation Certificate Transparency log built on Cloudflare Workers
features.description: Learn about recent developments in Certificate Transparency (CT), and how we built a next-generation CT log on top of Cloudflare's Developer Platform.

imageAssetFile.altText: A next-generation Certificate Transparency log built on Cloudflare Workers

contentfulAsset.description: A next-generation Certificate Transparency log built on Cloudflare Workers

features.title: Workers AI gets a speed boost, batch workload support, more LoRAs, new models, and a refreshed dashboard
features.description: We just made Workers AI inference faster with speculative decoding & prefix caching. Use our new batch inference for handling large request volumes seamlessly. Build tailored AI apps with more LoRA options. Lastly, new models and a refreshed dashboard round out this Developer Week update for Workers AI.

imageAssetFile.altText: Workers AI gets a speed boost, batch workload support, more LoRAs, new models, and a refreshed dashboard

contentfulAsset.description: Workers AI gets a speed boost, batch workload support, more LoRAs, new models, and a refreshed dashboard

features.title: Developer Week 2025 wrap-up
features.description: We've closed out Developer Week 2025. Here's a quick recap of the announcements and in-depth technical explorations that went out during the week.

imageAssetFile.altText: Developer Week 2025 wrap-up

contentfulAsset.description: Developer Week 2025 wrap-up
